snippet: When it comes to flamboyantly glamorous interiors, Rose Cumming - the dealer-decorator who opened for business in New York in 1921 and drew her last autocratic breath in 1968 - is still the one to beat.
abstract: When it comes to flamboyantly glamorous interiors, Rose Cumming - the dealer-decorator who opened for business in New York in 1921 and drew her last autocratic breath in 1968 - is still the one to beat.
